name: blogs.json
description: A list with metadata of all blogs written in markdown.

blogs.title: How to Use Prettier as a Github Action
blogs.description: Prettier is a great tool to format your code. In this article, I will show you how to use Prettier as a Github Action.
blogs.bannerAlt: Image of a website with the Prettier logo and the Github logo, styled in a robot-like way.
blogs.author: danieljancar

blogs.title: Husky - Perfect Git Hook to Reduce Refactoring Efforts
blogs.description: Husky is a great tool to add git hooks to your project. I will show you how to set it up and how it can reduce refactoring efforts.
blogs.bannerAlt: Image of a cartoon husky sitting in front of a coding IDE's.
blogs.author: danieljancar
